name: Cy Girls
synopsis: Dive into the futuristic cyber-world of the Cy Girls, an all-new action thriller starring the sexy duo of Ice and Aska.  This pair of spy-divas combine strength and style as they take on the nastiest of cyber-terrorists in a world where the real and the virtual co-exist.  As you guide Ice and Aska through the cyber-world, you can take advantage of Ice's weapons skills, Aska's ninja abilities, and acquire new skills along the way.  With beauty, brains, and brawn, these new heroines deliver twice the action.
